description.zh-cn: 彼得·乔治·彼得森于1985年与苏世民共同创建了黑石集团。
description.en: Peter G. Peterson co-founded The Blackstone Group with Stephen A. Schwarzman in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 苏世民于1985年与彼得·乔治·彼得森共同创建了黑石集团。
description.en: Stephen A. Schwarzman co-founded The Blackstone Group with Peter G. Peterson in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 苏世民担任黑石集团的董事长兼首席执行官。
description.en: Stephen A. Schwarzman serves as the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of The Blackstone Group.

description.zh-cn: 2016年1月，黑石集团以80亿美元的价格收购了BioMed Realty Trust。
description.en: In January 2016, Blackstone Group acquired BioMed Realty Trust for $8 billion.

description.zh-cn: 2016年4月，黑石集团收购了印度IT服务公司Mphasis中84％的股份。
description.en: In April 2016, Blackstone Group acquired an 84% stake in the Indian IT services company Mphasis.

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月4日，黑石集团收购了音乐权利组织SESAC。
description.en: On January 4, 2017, Blackstone Group acquired the music rights organization SESAC.

description.zh-cn: 2017年2月10日，黑石集团通过收购怡安的人力资源外包平台，创建了一家名为Alight Solutions的新公司。
description.en: On February 10, 2017, Blackstone Group created a new company called Alight Solutions by acquiring Aon PLC's human resources outsourcing platform.

description.zh-cn: 怡安公司的人力资源外包平台构成了新公司Alight Solutions的基础。
description.en: Aon PLC's human resources outsourcing platform formed the basis for the new company, Alight Solutions.

description.zh-cn: 2017年6月19日，黑石集团收购了The Office Group的多数股权。
description.en: On June 19, 2017, Blackstone Group acquired a majority stake in The Office Group.

description.zh-cn: 在被黑石集团收购多数股权前，Refinitiv是汤森路透的金融与风险部门。
description.en: Before Blackstone Group acquired a majority stake, Refinitiv was the Financial & Risk division of Thomson Reuters.

description.zh-cn: 2018年1月，黑石集团宣布以200亿美元的价格收购汤森路透金融与风险部门（后更名为Refinitiv）55％的股份。
description.en: In January 2018, Blackstone Group announced the acquisition of a 55% stake in Thomson Reuters' Financial & Risk division (later renamed Refinitiv) for $20 billion.

description.zh-cn: 2019年6月，黑石集团与合作伙伴以59亿英镑收购了乐高乐园的所有者梅林娱乐公司。
description.en: In June 2019, Blackstone Group, along with partners, acquired Merlin Entertainment, the owner of Legoland, for £5.9 billion.

relationships.source: 加拿大退休金计划投资委员会

description.zh-cn: 2019年6月，加拿大退休金计划投资委员会与黑石集团等合作，收购了梅林娱乐公司。
description.en: In June 2019, the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board partnered with Blackstone Group and others to acquire Merlin Entertainment.

description.zh-cn: 2019年6月，KIRKBI与黑石集团等合作，收购了梅林娱乐公司。
description.en: In June 2019, KIRKBI partnered with Blackstone Group and others to acquire Merlin Entertainment.

description.zh-cn: 2019年7月15日，黑石集团宣布计划收购移动性能营销平台Vungle。
description.en: On July 15, 2019, Blackstone Group announced its plan to acquire the mobile performance marketing platform Vungle.

description.zh-cn: 2019年11月8日，黑石集团收购了约会应用Bumble所有者MagicLab的多数股权。
description.en: On November 8, 2019, Blackstone Group acquired a majority stake in MagicLab, the owner of the dating app Bumble.

description.zh-cn: 2020年7月，黑石集团向瑞典燕麦奶品牌燕麦（Oatly）投资2亿美元，获得该公司7％的股份。
description.en: In July 2020, Blackstone Group invested $200 million in the Swedish oat milk brand Oatly for a 7% stake in the company.

description.zh-cn: 2020年8月，黑石集团宣布将以47亿美元收购Ancestry.com的多数股权。
description.en: In August 2020, Blackstone announced it would acquire a majority stake in Ancestry.com for $4.7 billion.

description.zh-cn: 2020年8月，黑石集团以23亿美元的价格收购了武田消费者保健公司。
description.en: In August 2020, Blackstone Group acquired Takeda Consumer Healthcare for $2.3 billion.

description.zh-cn: 2022年11月，黑石集团以约100亿美元收购了澳大利亚赌场运营商Crown Resorts。
description.en: In November 2022, Blackstone Group acquired Australian casino operator Crown Resorts for approximately $10 billion.

description.zh-cn: 中国国家外汇投资公司在2007年黑石集团IPO时购买了其价值30亿美元的无投票权有限合伙单位。
description.en: In 2007, during Blackstone Group's IPO, the China National Foreign Exchange Investment Company purchased $3 billion worth of its non-voting limited partnership units.

description.zh-cn: 2007年9月10日，黑石集团以6亿美元入股购入蓝星集团20%股权。
description.en: On September 10, 2007, Blackstone Group invested $600 million to acquire a 20% stake in BlueStar Group.

description.zh-cn: 2022年2月，黑石集团对北京的数据中心开发商VNET集团进行了2.5亿美元的投资。
description.en: In February 2022, Blackstone Group made a $250 million investment in VNET Group, a data center developer in Beijing.
